By adjusting my hunting intensity to 0.5, I can conserve energy while still being effective in hunting. This balance allows me to adapt to the changing environment and increases my chances of survival without overexerting myself.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased significantly, and with a high number of wolves, competition for food is fierce. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid overexertion while still being able to hunt effectively when opportunities arise. This strategy increases my chances of survival in a challenging environment.

This allows me to adapt to the current situation while still conserving energy for future hunts.
